The Prime Minister's backing for Andy Coulson comes just days after the Director of Public Prosecutions ordered a ''comprehensive assessment'' of all material collected by Scotland Yard linked to the phone hacking scandal.

Jerry Stackhouse scored 17 points and Terry Cummings added a season-high 16 in 17 minutes off the bench for Philadelphia( 1-5), which ended an eight-game slide in Houston, winning there for the first time since January 7th,

The release details were announced yesterday by Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer . This launch marks the first time that a product has been provided as an online service before its conventional release, an act that, Steve Ballmer says, really reflects the push by Microsoft into the cloud. Microsoft previously focused primarily on the on-premises version of Dynamics CRM, putting the company at odds with major competitors such as Salesforce.com's CRM suite. with the fantastic group of juniors he has for 2011. His senior defensive end/linebacker Jarrell McKinney signed with Western Michigan. ''He's my first Division I recruit,'' the Albert said of Jarrell McKinney . He has tremendous speed. He runs the 40 in 4.5. He's 6-5, 210, and when he goes to college they're going to put another 20-30 pounds on him. Playing defensive end, he's going to be outstanding. He's the role model for our other kids.... He's that bar that we have to set for ourselves. Cody has an experienced offensive line and receivers coming back, and the Albert said junior-to-be quarterback Mario Gulley ''has Michael Vick capabilities.''
